name: Magic Shrooms & Soup-er Pumpkins
description:
Made for the 2022 #FemDev Game Jam 

Theme: Magic

Diversifiers: Can’t Jump Can’t Shoot, Color Accessible, Play on Words

--

Magic Shrooms & Soup-er Pumpkins is an arcade game where you control a group of magic mushrooms.

You command your magic shrooms to collect as many pumpkins as you can to make the tastiest pumpkin soup for yourself and your friends. But watch out! There are aggressive hedgehogs falling from the sky that will damage your shrooms. 

This game was inspired by Nintendo’s Pikmin real-time-strategy series. 

--

Right-click to command your army of mushrooms!

--

Credits: Iuliia (art), David (programming), Felix (programming), Ambar (art), Jess (sound), Alina (production), Audio Cabin (music)

> Mac Users: please download and play in the itch.io app!
